#summary Dictionary of the project.

= List of terms being used =

== Actors ==

=== User === - person using system

=== Scientis=== - person who can run simulation through terminal 

=== Administrator=== - person responsible for configuration of the workflow

*Project* - root of all evil [TODO]

*System* - all resources and programs using in project

*Workflow* - program running on workflow server (sequence of steps) 

*Client* - program which gives users possibility to remotely run simulation or administrator to change settings of workflow

*Module* - single unit of workflow (e.g. mesh generator)

*Terminal* - place where client runs

*Workflow Server* - machine which controls flow of the program

*Calculation Server* - place where modules' calculations are being performed
